Equipment Actions.Action 1: Beak, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Talons, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 14 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Vrock makes 2 attacks, one with its Beak and one with its Talons
Other Actions.Action 2: Spores, The Vrock releases a cloud of toxic spores that can poison creatures caught in the cloud
Other Actions.Action 3: Stunning Screech, The Crock emits a horrific screech, attempting to stun any non-demon creatures that can hear it

Abilities.Ability 1: Magic Resistance, The Vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
